name: websql-autocomplete-2
description: A library that provides autocompletion and errors highlighting for various database dialects

scripts.generate:mysql: rimraf src/parsers/mysql/generated && antlr4ng -Dlanguage=TypeScript -o src/parsers/mysql/generated/ -visitor -no-listener -Xexact-output-dir src/parsers/mysql/grammar/MySqlLexer.g4 src/parsers/mysql/grammar/MySqlParser.g4 && bash src/parsers/patch-generated.sh mysql
scripts.generate:postgresql: rimraf src/parsers/postgresql/generated && antlr4ng -Dlanguage=TypeScript -o src/parsers/postgresql/generated/ -visitor -no-listener -Xexact-output-dir src/parsers/postgresql/grammar/PostgreSqlLexer.g4 src/parsers/postgresql/grammar/PostgreSqlParser.g4 && bash src/parsers/patch-generated.sh postgresql --extra-postgresql-patches
scripts.generate:clickhouse: rimraf src/parsers/clickhouse/generated && antlr4ng -Dlanguage=TypeScript -o src/parsers/clickhouse/generated/ -visitor -no-listener -Xexact-output-dir src/parsers/clickhouse/grammar/ClickHouseLexer.g4 src/parsers/clickhouse/grammar/ClickHouseParser.g4 && bash src/parsers/patch-generated.sh clickhouse
scripts.build: rimraf dist && node build.js && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json
